attributes.action: ensure that money raised from Local Council Taxes must be solely for use in the Local Council Area in which it is paid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is to cease the practise of a Government channelling local money into other sections of the budget which should be covered by normal taxation. (Stopping Governments from raising stealth taxes instead of Income Tax, merely to save face.)
This would also prevent a Government from transferring funds from one area, with high house prices, to another area more sympathetic to that Government. (Effectively, this would reduce the practise of political bribes for votes.) 
Thus, a Band D house in Area A, valued at £400,000, does not necessarily pay a penny more than a similar house in Area B, valued at £200,000.
